Social Psychology, 11th Edition (c2013), textbook by David G. Myers.

---------
 1. Introducing Social Psychology
PART ONE - SOCIAL THINKING

PART TWO - SOCIAL INFLUENCE

 7. Persuasion
 8. Group Influence
PART THREE - SOCIAL RELATIONS
 9. Prejudice: Disliking others

 11. Attraction and Intimacy: Liking and Loving Others
 12. Helping
 13. Conflict and Peacemaking
PART FOUR - APPLYING SOCIAL PSYCHOLOGY
 14. Social Psychology in the Clinic

 16. Social Psychology and the Sustainable Future

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (with 856 pictures accounting for 91% of the file's size)
